documents.document:
awesome

yes i finally got this figured out.. sort of.. i dunno yet... it's so confusing on here... and i only have one friend.. that's intresting.. not sure why that's intresting.. i'm so bored right now...no one wants to talk to me for some reason.. not even timmy.. which is weird... not that i want to talk to him ne way.. he's my very strange cousin... he's just odd... ne ways... i like how fast it is on here.. i so need to get some pictures on here...hmm... i'm just so bored so i decided to write in my blog that probably no one will read because no one ever reads my blogs on ne thing... it's fun because i can make fun of people and they never know.. mwahahaha.. gosh i'm just weird.. well peace out

what would i have done

Kamille... i love you.. you've been my best friend forever... and if you would have died yesterday... i honestly don't know what i would do.. i would make my parents move me to like canada and i would have to go emo... just because without you i would not be the person i am today.. all our randomness and dorkiness... i'll never forget our staring contest with the cows and our constant games of truth or dare even tho we know everything possible about eachother... i couldn't go on without you kamille... your like my sister.. i dunno... if you were to move you would have to take me with you... because who would go through the mall with me all day long till we get tired of saying that's cute over and over and over again... or who would get a yorkshire terrier with me and name the riley and kiki... your my riley... my cocoa... my tata would be gone... and the only person who gets these things are you... i love you kamille... never leave me... i couldn't go on

yay.. it's 2:00

wait it's always 2:00.. oh well... gosh my life is so dramatic... it's kind of fun.. well talk to y'all later... stay awesome... wait i'm not talking to ne one.. oh well... oo a boat

It's ME

well of course it's me who else would it be... im so excited right now... it's exciting...

ne ways... i just figured... i'd be random and put random things on a blog... like my favorite color is orange and i like turtles... hehe... that was random... well now i'm like super excited and can't type 5 things at once.. so ttyl

?

wow... it has been a very intresting week... and i'm sure you know who i'm saying this too.. but i have to tell you something.. it's going to drive me nutz.. even if you don't have to know... i have to tell you... and just being friends for now is ok with me... honestly.. i think it's for the better... ... it's just another trip on the Life Avenue... the longest road we'll ever travel... with you or with out you.. life goes on... and your still awesome...

yay me... hehe

well volleyball today was intresting.. actually it sucked.. i learned if i'm not having ne fun i really suck at it... so yeah... but it was so hot in there today... ne ways.. i love the beatles and i'm downloading iron man right now.. it's very exiciting... i'm finally getting the solo down... it' so much fun.. but it's very hard to memorize... and my website really sux right now... ne one who reads this i ask you to check it out... www.fshaw-dat.piczo.com ... tell me if you agree... i'm going to change it completely... it's going to be very funn
and some questions that haunt me... should i hug mackenzie or high five him... this is using super poke on facebook.. this is a very melting question that is quite intrestin

headache much

it finally hit me... today... 4 days later... i was holding it in for 4 days and it all came out... i need a break... as in no communication with him for 2 weeks... i hope you read this chase.. because i don't want to e-mail because it's the same as communication.. and this is pushing it.. i still have something to tell you... but not yet... i'm still debating whether i should... ttyin2weeks...

bored out of my mind

I am really really bored.. and honestly have nothing to do... ever since last saturday it's been really boring and there hasn't been ne drama.. i don't know what to do... i've had drama all summer long then it just stops.... i'm so confused... quite intresting...and the 7th harry potter book sux and Rowling needs to re-write it... it was so not awesome... so yeah... im' bored

ooo awesome

yeah it's been a rather intresting last few days... i love my family... they're so awesome... tho i'll most likely never see my aunt linda again... her and my mom don't get along so well... oh well... she's staying at my house ne ways... and yeah... i have a headache and i wish i was in town right now with my friends... and i miss my grandpa... i'll never forget what the pastor said and i've heard my grandpa say this "god blessed me with a good life a good wife and a good family... i don't need a girlfriend"... that's straight from Grandpa Bud.. I'll miss You ...

bored as hell with nothing to do

I"m seriously bored... VB starts on monday and i've done nothing to prepare... mainly because it's wet out side right now and i've had family over for the past few days... this sux.. i have a headache.. again.. which is just stupid... my mind is in a billion places at once... i need my friends right now... and i have work tomorrow which is so not fun... actually it sux.. it really sux.. i just hope i feel better tomorrow.. and this is a really boring blog.. oh well

My Sharona (cell phone info)

Ok .. this is only named My Sharona because that's the song I'm listening to... I'm writing this.. to let people know that My cell ohone will be on this weekend... because I'm going camping and there's service there.. so yeah... my cell is 550-1167... tho most likely none of you will call me... which is ok... no one ever does ne way.. because it's never on... and if it happens to be turned off... please leave you name and number because when it's off It doesn't tell me who called me... so yeah... just to let all you people know...

I'm so busy

OMG... i can't believe my schedule right now... I'm so busy.. i have a VB game tomorrow night. .i went to towner today... that was fun... then i may or may not have to run the camera at the football game depending upon VB practice... then on wednesday i have church group.. and starting today i'm officially my FFA chapter President.. i'm so excited.. i also have to write a speech on agriculture.. and think of a good sci fair project and STAR event... it should be totally awesome

brain's on over drive and i can't find the shift

ok... i can explain high school in one 5 letter word... DRAMA... i don't mind it... i mean you won't go ne where and be able to avoid drama... it's just a simple fact... and yes it sux at times but you get used to it around your junior year when it doesn't really matter cause you only have 2 years of school left... ne ways... my brain is on over drive right now.. it's arguing with it self over whether or not i like this guy or not... i used to like him a long time ago... then it comes back about once a year and goes away.. but that's because i usually like some one else at the time... but now i don't... not at my school ne ways... there's like some guys i have no chance with cause they live too far away.. so they don't count... so yeah... i'm pretty sure i still like him.. but then i don't at the same time... like i said.. my brain is aruguing.. and i know i sound crazy... but that's just how it is... you call me crazy or weird because of it.. i'll call you normal... so ha.. take that.. lol... i'm so strange some times...

?The Unforgettable Cliche? (what every girl wants)

The Unforgettable Cliche (what every girl wants) ... by Saralynn Mae Davis

Every girl wants that one guy that will make her smile when she sees him, hears his voice, or when he's near her.
Every girl wants that one guy that she'll never forget, no matter what happens
Every girl wants that one guy that she can be near and feel safe like the only thing to fear is the unforever
Every girl wants that one guy who will make her laugh when she's crying, but only after he put his arm around her and says it's ok... even though he doesn't know whats wrong
Every girl wants that one guy that says it's hard being so far away, even if he's only on the other side of the room

How cliche in the most unforgettable way, because every girl wants to be with that one guy that makes her feel special, like she's some one, and no matter what any one tells her, she will always think back to that one guy who made her smile, made her laugh, who helped her find herself, and who was simply there to make her day better, no matter how far away, how near, or how crabby she was.

It sounds like that song every one knows that everyone gets sick of after being played on the radio one too many times, but everyone still loves it, because its still a good song, if it wasn't the radio wouldn't have played it in the first place.

It sounds like an everyday cinderella story, but instead of meeting him & falling in love immediately, it's the simple wants of that one girl that helps her find her prince charming, and that one dance when they first start to like each other even though they don't know each other yet, but it comes in time.

The story of the everyday girl who wants to find her prince charming, that one guy, that one moment, the unforgettable cliche.

this is my all time favorite song ever.. i love it

100 years- Five for Fighting

I'm 15 for a moment
Caught in between 10 and 20
And I'm just dreaming
Counting the ways to where you are
I'm 22 for a moment
She feels better than ever
And we're on fire
Making our way back from Mars
15 there's still time for you
Time to buy and time to lose
15, there's never a wish better than this
When you only got 100 years to live
I'm 33 for a moment
Still the man, but you see I'm a they
A kid on the way
A family on my mind
I'm 45 for a moment
The sea is high
And I'm heading into a crisis
Chasing the years of my life
15 there's still time for you
Time to buy, Time to lose yourself
Within a morning star
15 I'm all right with you
15, there's never a wish better than this
When you only got 100 years to live
Half time goes by
Suddenly you’re wise
Another blink of an eye
67 is gone
The sun is getting high
We're moving on...
I'm 99 for a moment
Dying for just another moment
And I'm just dreaming
Counting the ways to where you are
15 there's still time for you
22 I feel her too
33 you’re on your way
Every day's a new day...
15 there's still time for you
Time to buy and time to choose
Hey 15, there's never a wish better than this
When you only got 100 years to live

thank you

thank you...thank you for coming into my life.. i've needed you for some long now... i'm not sure if it's a good thing. or a bad thing when if don't talk to you for at least an hour every day .. i get paranoid again... you have taken it away.. or at least you have helped me forget about beign scared.. and forget about thinking about how things may or may not happen... you've helped me in so many ways.. you have no idea... i love you... and i want to say thank you... you deserve better than me... but i have you now... and life would be really hard with out.. i should say that.. it could end up in pain.. but it's true... i suppose i would live... i would have to... but to not be able to see you.. or talk to you... or hold you... or have any contact with you... it would be like a real torture... you've done so much for me now.. you're so amazing.. and thank you... i love you
